tuv.seg: Appealing the Decision in a Civil Case
Achomharc ar an gCinneadh
If you are unhappy with the result of your case, you may wish to appeal your case to a higher court
Má tá tú míshásta le toradh do cháis, d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh fonn ort achomharc a chur ós comhair cúirte níos airde
It will mean going through the entire process all over again
Beidh ort tosnú ón tús leis an bpróiséas ar fad
If your case was commenced in the District Court, it can be appealed to the Circuit Court
Más sa Chúirt Dúiche a cuireadh tús le do chás is féidir achomharc a chur ós comhair na Cúirte Cuardaí
A case commenced in the Circuit Court may be appealed to the High Court
Is féidir achomharc ar chás a bhí sa Chúirt Chuarda a chur ós comhair na hArdchúirte
A High Court case may be appealed to the Court of Appeal
Is féidir achomharc ar chás a bhí san Ardchúirt a chur chuig an gCúirt Achomhairc
You may choose to appeal the original judge's decision in its entirety, i.e., his/her decision on who was to blame and the damages awarded (if they were awarded), in which case the appeal court may

Is féidir leat achomharc a dhéanadh ar chinneadh an bhreithimh ina iomlán, i.e. a c(h)inneadh ar cé a bhí ciontach agus na damáistí a bhronn sé/sí (má bhronn), sa chás seo is féidir leis an gcúirt achomhairc
1. agree with the decision of the original court and uphold it or 2
• aontú leis an gcinneadh a rinne an chéad chúirt agus seasamh leis nó
disagree with the decision of the original court and overturn it or 3
• easaontú leis an gcinneadh a rinne an chéad chúirt agus an cinneadh sin a chur ar neamhní nó
increase or decrease the amount of damages awarded
• na damáistí a bronnadh a ardú nó a ísliú
If you are happy with decision made by the original judge in relation to who was at fault but unhappy with the amount of damages he/she has awarded, you may appeal the amount of damages awarded only

Má tá tú sásta leis an gcinneadh a rinne an chéad bhreitheamh maidir leis an té a bhí ciontach ach má tá tú míshásta leis an méid damáistí a bhronn sé/sí, is féidir achomharc a lorg ar an méid damáistí a bronnadh amháin
Then the appeal court may either increase or decrease the amount of damages awarded by the original judge
Is féidir leis an gcúirt achomhairc ansin na damáistí a bhronn an chéad bhreitheamh a ardú nó a ísliú
If you lose your appeal, you will have to pay the costs of both sides so any offers to settle made by the other side should be seriously considered
Muna n-éiríonn leat san achomharc beidh ort costais an dá thaobh a íoc agus mar sin má dhéanann an taobh eile aon tairiscint an cás a réiteach leat ba cheart breathnú ar sin go cúramach
